channel.title: C++ on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in C++ on Terminal

item.title: Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword Decompilation
item.description:
Decompilation of Skyward Sword for the Nintendo Wii

  • Contributed to the decompilation of game by using analysis techniques and programs

Github repository: https://github.com/KidWizardOfTheWeb/ss

Tech Stack:

  • C++
  • PowerPC Assembly
  • Ghidra - https://github.com/NationalSecurityAgency/ghidra

item.title: Sonic Riders: Tournament Edition
item.description:
Decompilation, recompilation, and modification of Sonic Riders for the GameCube

June 2022 - Present

Link to website: https://www.sonicriders.org/

Link to fork of public repository (differs from development repository): https://github.com/KidWizardOfTheWeb/sonicriderste_KC

Development repository can be shown upon request for reference by hiring managers.

Tech Stack:

  • C
  • C++
  • PowerPC Assembly
  • Python
